info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for our application

get.description: Fetches the application settings by ID. This retrieves settings related to the website, including details like logo, address, mobile number, email, and other important configuration data. Currently retrieves the record with ID 1, which contains the key settings for the application.

login_slogan.example: Innovate Together@Empower Your Potential@Unleash Your Creativity@Login to Lead@Code. Connect. Create@Your Gateway to Innovation@Collaborate and Conquer@Where Ideas Take Flight@Enter the Realm of Possibilities@Together We Build Tomorrow

short_description.example: The DITA short description is one device to achieve 'progressive disclosure' in topic-based writing, in the sense that title expands to short description, which expands to the topic itself as a user drills into information.

post.summary: Get sub-localities and project count by locality
post.description: Fetches sub-localities under a specified locality along with the count of projects in each sub-locality.

200.description: Successfully fetched sub-localities with project count

post.description: Fetches active banners based on the provided categories ['buy','rent','commercial','plot','living']

get.description: Fetches active testimonials based on status and user status. Returns name, image, rating, and description.

500.description: An error occurred while fetching the data

get.description: Fetches top-rated projects based on the 'Top_Projects' category. Includes project details, property images, configurations, sizes, amenities, and pricing.

project_description.example: A builder project description is a document that outlines the details of a construction project, including the project's goals, timeline, and budget. It also describes the people and resources involved in the project.

500.description: An error occurred while fetching the data

get.description: Fetches the top 5 premium property projects
Fetches the top 5 affordable property projects based on specific criteria.
Fetches affordable rental projects with related details like locality, amenities, BHK values, build-up area, pricing, and property images.

get.summary: Get property counts by BHK types
get.description: Fetches the count of properties grouped by BHK types, including 1 RK, 1 BHK to 5 BHK, and 5+ BHK.

200.description: Property counts by BHK types fetched successfully

post.description: Login using username and password and receive a token.
Authenticates the user by generating and sending an OTP to their registered whatsapp mobile number.

username.description: The mobile number of the user.

message.example: Otp sent to registered mobile no.

mobile.description: The mobile number of the user.

post.description: Validates the OTP and authenticates the user by returning an access token.

otp.description: The OTP sent to the user

get.description: Fetches the details of the currently authenticated user. If the user's status is not '1', access is denied.

status.description: Indicates if the request was successful

403.description: Access denied. User account is inactive or suspended.
